title: Modify myA outside SomeClass - write code

content.prompt: Which of the following methods can be added to  SomeClass  to allow other classes to modify the value of  myA?

choices.label:
public void setA(int newA)
{
   myA = newA;
}

private void setA(int newA)
{
   myA = newA;
}

public void setA(int newA)
{
   newA = myA;
}

private void setA(int newA)
{
   newA = myA;
}

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
